feed.title: Carpentries@UGA
feed.subtitle: The huib page for all Software and Data Carpentry work happening at the University of Georgia

entry.title: New UGA Carpentries website up
entry.content: We’ve revamped the Carpentries@UGA website to be sleeker and more streamlined. Look here for upcoming information on workshops, instructor training, etc.
entry.summary: We’ve revamped the Carpentries@UGA website to be sleeker and more streamlined. Look here for upcoming information on workshops, instructor training, etc.
